1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 import math
3 
4 
5 def get_angle_2_points(x1, y1, x2, y2):
6  """
7  angle of the line starting at (x1,y1) and finishing at (x2,y2), according to repere trigonometrique
8  :param x1: x position of the first point
9  :param y1: y position of the first point
10  :param x2: x position of the second point
11  :param y2: y position of the second point
12  :return: angle in radians
13  """
14  dy = float(y2) - float(y1)
15  dx = float(x2) - float(x1)
16  if dx == 0:
17  # return 90 if dy > 0 else -90
18  return math.pi / 2 if dy > 0 else -math.pi / 2
19 
20  else:
21  return math.atan2(dy, dx)
22 
23 
24 def euclidean_dist(x1, y1, x2, y2):
25  """
26  Return euclidean distance between 2 points
27  :param x1: x position of the first point
28  :param y1: y position of the first point
29  :param x2: x position of the second point
30  :param y2: y position of the second point
31  :return: distance in the same metrics as the points
32  """
33  return math.sqrt((float(x1) - float(x2)) ** 2 + (float(y1) - float(y2)) ** 2)
34 
35 
36 def euclidean_dist_2_pts(p1, p2):
37  """
38  Return euclidean distance between 2 points
39  :param p1: tuple(X,Y) of the first point's coordinates
40  :param p2: tuple(X,Y) of the second point's coordinates
41  :return: distance in the same metrics as the points
42  """
43  x1, y1 = p1
44  x2, y2 = p2
45  return math.sqrt((float(x1) - float(x2)) ** 2 + (float(y1) - float(y2)) ** 2)
46 
47 
48 def euclidean_3d_dist(p1, p2):
49  """
50  Return euclidean 3d distance between 2 points
51  :param p1: Point of the first point's coordinates
52  :param p2: Point of the second point's coordinates
53  :return: distance in the same metrics as the points
54  """
55  return math.sqrt(
56  (float(p1.x) - float(p2.x)) ** 2 + (float(p1.y) - float(p2.y)) ** 2 + (float(p1.z) - float(p2.z)) ** 2)
57 
58 
59 def calculate_barycenter(list_points):
60  """
61  Return barycenter of a list of points
62 
63  :param list_points: list of Point
64  """
65  from geometry_msgs.msg import Point
66  barycenter = Point()
67  for point in list_points:
68  barycenter.x += point.x
69  barycenter.y += point.y
70  barycenter.z += point.z
71 
72  barycenter.x = barycenter.x / len(list_points)
73  barycenter.y = barycenter.y / len(list_points)
74  barycenter.z = barycenter.z / len(list_points)
75 
76  return barycenter
